title: Global warming
text: Global warming, driven by human activities such as burning fossil fuels and deforestation, accelerates Earth's temperature rise, leading to profound environmental shifts. Melting ice caps, rising sea levels, extreme weather events, and disrupted ecosystems are among its impacts. Urgent collective action is imperative to mitigate its devastating consequences and safeguard our planet's future.
author: Gretha Tunberg

title: Made it
text: Quite cool web site. I have backend and frontend here. Pretty proud of myself.
